name: HealingGame
description:
Made for a game jam. Theme - Healing.

Take the role as a healer for a party of 4 other knights, as you dwell into a dungeon to kill the skeleton king. Heal your companions when needed, and purify the skeletons as they fall, but be quick! Otherwise they will rise again.

Controls

WASD : Movement
Left-Click: Mana Ball
Right-Click: AOE Attack
